description:
It’s time for Kawachi to face off against Spencer Henry Hoko! After learning more about how hard his father worked, Kawachi is more determined than ever to obtain victory! Can he achieve his father’s dreams?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Victoire ! Révolutionne le monde du pain !
Victory! Pan Gyoukai ni Kakumei o!
Victory!! A Revolution in the Bread Industry!
วิคตอรี่! ปฏิวัติวงการขนมปัง
ヴィクトリー!! パン業界に革命を!
